column16: On 02/07/2015 At threadneedle street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction

On 28/08/2015 At HARROW ROAD HA9 Being a passenger on a Public Service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares did use in relation to the journey you were taking a ticket which had been issued for use by another person on terms that it is not transferable
